text: The 2017–18 FC Red Bull Salzburg season was the 85th season in club history. The team was able to defend the chmpionship. They lost the Cup final versus SK Sturm Graz. ==Squad== 2017/18 * Goalkeepers:33 Alexander Walke,31 Carlos Coronel,1 Cican Stankovic * Defenders: 3 Paulo Miranda, 5 Duje Caleta-Car, 6 Jerome Onguene, 17 Andreas Ulmer, 22 Stefan Lainer, 23 Stefan Stangl, 25 Patrick Farkas, 34 Marin Pongracic, 44 Igor, 55 Luca Meisl * Midfielders:4 Amadou Haidara, 7 Reinhold Yabo, 8 Diadie Samassekou, 11 Marc Rzatkowski ,13 Hannes Wolf, 14 Valon Berisha, 42 Xaver Schlager, 24 Christoph Leitgeb, 20 David Atanga, 45 Enock Mwepu * Forwards:9 Munas Dabbur, 18 Takumi Minamino, 19 Hee-Chan Hwang, 21 Fredrik Gulbrandsen, 29 Samuel Tetteh, 41 Patson Daka, * Marco Rose (Headcoach), Rene Aufhauser, Rene Maric, Alexander Zickler (Assistance coaches), Herbert Ilsanker (Goalkkeeper coach) ==Matches== ==Table== Team Sp.
